Description:
Transport clients and/or packages to and from destinations
Arrive at destinations on schedule
Fulfill administrative needs, like office pickups
Research and plan for traffic, construction and weather delays
Use navigation applications to determine the best route
Interact with clients professionally at all times
Ensure that the vehicle is always fueled and ready for use
Arrange for vehicle repairs as needed
Keep mileage records and repair records up-to-dateSkills

Has to be on VISA 18 in Kuwait Ahli without government contracts or small projects to transfer
